items.title: Meaning of Imagine Dragons' 'Believer'
items.description: Islamic perspective on faith and resilience
items.query: What's the meaning of Imagine Dragons' song 'Believer' and how might its themes of pain, faith and resilience relate to Islamic teachings?

items.title: I can't stop scrolling TikTok before bed
items.query: I'm addicted to scrolling TikTok before bed and it's affecting my sleep and Fajr prayer. What guidance does the Quran offer?

items.title: Islamic perspective on AI and ChatGPT
items.query: What would Islamic scholars say about artificial intelligence like ChatGPT and our increasing dependence on technology?

items.title: Understanding the Israel-Palestine conflict
items.description: Historical context from an Islamic perspective
items.query: Can you explain the Israel-Palestine conflict from an Islamic historical perspective and what the Quran teaches about peace and justice?

items.title: Islamic themes in 'Dune: Part Two'
items.query: What Islamic themes and influences can be found in 'Dune: Part Two', and how accurately does it represent concepts from Islamic tradition?

items.title: Meaning of Billie Eilish's 'Birds of a Feather'
items.query: What spiritual themes are in Billie Eilish's song 'Birds of a Feather' and how might they relate to Islamic concepts of love and companionship?

items.title: Islamic representation in 'The Acolyte'
items.query: Are there any Islamic influences in the Star Wars series 'The Acolyte'? How does it compare to other spiritual themes in the franchise?

items.title: Family-friendly streaming options
items.description: Finding media aligned with Islamic values
items.query: What guidelines should Muslim families follow when choosing Netflix or Disney+ content? Can you recommend some family-friendly shows that align with Islamic values?

items.title: Meaning of Kendrick Lamar's 'Not Like Us'
items.description: Analyzing popular lyrics through Islamic lens
items.query: What's the meaning behind Kendrick Lamar's song 'Not Like Us' and how might its themes of community and identity relate to Islamic spiritual concepts?

items.title: My husband keeps leaving dishes in the sink
items.description: Patience in marriage from Islamic perspective
items.query: My husband keeps leaving dishes in the sink and it frustrates me. How can I handle small annoyances in marriage according to Islamic teachings?

items.title: My teenager is addicted to Fortnite
items.description: Islamic guidance on screen time and gaming
items.query: My teenager spends hours playing Fortnite and ignores family time. What does Islam teach about balancing recreation with family responsibilities?

items.title: I'm always the one cleaning up after everyone
items.description: Fairness and mutual respect in the home
items.query: I'm always the one cleaning up after everyone in my family. What does the Quran say about fairness and mutual respect in household responsibilities?

items.title: Teaching children about Islam in a public school environment
items.query: How can I teach my children about Islam when they attend public school and are constantly exposed to different values and beliefs?

items.title: My parents want me to be a doctor or lawyer
items.description: Balancing parental respect with personal goals
items.query: My parents want me to pursue medicine or law, but I'm passionate about tech and entrepreneurship. How can I follow my passion while respecting my parents according to Islamic teachings?

items.title: My spouse is always on social media
items.query: My spouse is constantly scrolling through Instagram and TikTok, even during family time. How can I address this issue with compassion according to Islamic principles?

items.title: My mother-in-law is too involved in our marriage
items.query: My mother-in-law is constantly giving unsolicited advice about our marriage. How can I establish healthy boundaries while still showing respect according to Islamic teachings?

items.title: Finding a spouse in the age of dating apps
items.query: I'm struggling to find a spouse who shares my Islamic values while using dating apps like Muzmatch and Salams. What guidance does Islam offer for finding a compatible partner in the digital age?

items.title: Disagreeing about Islamic school vs. public school
items.query: I want to send our children to Islamic school, but my spouse prefers public school. How can we find common ground while ensuring our children receive proper Islamic education?

items.title: My sister married a non-Muslim
items.description: Maintaining family bonds while honoring faith
items.query: My sister recently married a non-Muslim man against our parents' wishes. How should I maintain a good relationship with her while staying true to my Islamic values?

items.title: I can't stop shopping on Amazon Prime
items.query: I can't stop impulse shopping on Amazon Prime and it's affecting my finances. What does the Quran teach about moderation in spending and avoiding materialism?

items.title: Office politics and gossip in Slack channels
items.query: My colleagues constantly gossip about management in private Slack channels. How should I respond according to Islamic teachings about backbiting and workplace ethics?

items.title: Are index funds and 401(k) plans halal?
items.query: I'm considering investing in S&P 500 index funds and my company's 401(k) plan. How can I ensure my retirement investments are halal according to Islamic principles?

items.title: Working at a company that serves alcohol
items.query: I work at a tech company that has beer on tap in the office and regular happy hours. How can I navigate this environment while adhering to Islamic principles?

items.title: Starting a halal food delivery service
items.query: I'm planning to start a halal food delivery service. What does Islam teach about ethical business practices, fair pricing, and treatment of employees?

items.title: Maintaining faith during mental health struggles
items.query: I'm dealing with depression and anxiety, and it's affecting my connection with Allah. How can I maintain my faith while also seeking professional mental health support?

items.title: Understanding Qadr in times of global crisis
items.query: With all the suffering in the world today, I'm struggling to understand divine wisdom. Can you explain the concept of Qadr (divine decree) in Islam in relation to global crises?

items.title: Faith doubts after studying science
items.query: Since studying biology and evolution in college, I've had doubts about my faith. How can I reconcile scientific knowledge with Islamic teachings?

items.title: Making dua for marriage but still single
items.description: Persistence in prayer during waiting periods
items.query: I've been making dua to find a spouse for years, but I'm still single at 35. Should I keep asking or accept that marriage might not be in my destiny?
Is seeking therapy or counseling compatible with Islamic teachings about relying on Allah?

items.text: What does the Quran say about resilience?
items.query: What does the Quran say about resilience and perseverance during difficult times?
Are mindfulness techniques compatible with Islamic prayer? How can I improve my focus during salah?
How can I maintain a healthy work-life balance while fulfilling my religious obligations as a Muslim professional?

items.text: Is listening to pop music haram?
items.query: What does Islam say about listening to mainstream pop music like Taylor Swift or Beyonc√©? Is it permissible?
Can you explain the main differences between Sunni and Shia Islam in a respectful and balanced way?
I face subtle Islamophobic comments at my workplace. What's the best way to respond professionally while staying true to Islamic teachings?
How does the popular intermittent fasting trend compare to Islamic fasting traditions? Is it compatible with Islamic teachings?
What would be an Islamic perspective on the themes of messiah figures and religious manipulation in 'Dune: Part Two'?
What's the meaning behind SZA's song 'Snooze' and how might its themes of love and attachment relate to Islamic teachings about relationships?

items.title: Islam and mental health medication
items.query: Is it permissible in Islam to take antidepressants or anxiety medication? How can I balance relying on Allah with seeking medical treatment for mental health?

items.title: Modesty during hospital stays
items.description: Navigating healthcare while preserving Islamic values
items.query: I'm scheduled for surgery that will require a hospital stay. How can I maintain Islamic modesty standards during my hospital stay with various medical staff?

items.title: Halal alternatives to popular supplements
items.query: I'm into fitness and nutrition but worried about non-halal ingredients in protein powders and supplements. What halal alternatives exist and what does Islam teach about body optimization?

items.title: Managing diabetes during Ramadan
items.description: Finding balance between health and worship
items.query: I have Type 2 diabetes but want to fast during Ramadan. What accommodations does Islam allow for people with my condition, and how can I safely observe the fast?
